summary: Accomplished and results-oriented investment professional with strong leadership and interpersonal skills who adds energy and value to organizational excellence.

experience.title: Investment Accountant
experience.description: Reconciled mutual fund accounts with custody; identified and resolved differences in cash, currency and positions using Eagle, IAX, Business Objects, Lombardi and Workbench; communicated with and supported other areas in the firm; conducted weekly client meetings; trained and supervised offshore staff in Pune; assisted platform migration testing; ran daily fund accounting reports using Business Objects and MS Database; received special achievement awards in December 2013 and December 2014.

experience.title: AML Compliance Officer
experience.description: Audited customers' bank accounts in the company's system; performed quality assurance reviews on customer information; reconciled QA results on spreadsheets; performed background searches on clients using World-Check and Google.

experience.title: Medical Technologist
experience.description: Clinical Microbiology: ordering, processing, plating and culturing patients' specimens; rapid tests such as Rapid Flu and C. Difficile quick check and confirmatory tests; reading Gram stain slides; daily maintenance and quality control on instruments.
